meanings.definition: To talk or write in a foolish or meaningless way.
meanings.sent1: Please don't bedrivel during our important meeting.
meanings.sent2: She tends to bedrivel when she's nervous.
meanings.sent3: His constant bedriveling about aliens visiting Earth made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The politician's speech was nothing but bedriveling, lacking any substance.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's lecture was so boring that it seemed to bedrivel on endlessly.

meanings.definition: Foolish or meaningless talk or writing.
meanings.sent1: I couldn't stand listening to his bedrivel any longer.
meanings.sent2: Her essay was filled with nonsensical bedrivel.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's act was a hilarious mix of jokes and bedrivel.
meanings.sent4: The book was disappointing, full of empty bedrivel that added no value.
meanings.sent5: The meeting was unproductive, filled with endless bedrivel and no real discussion.
